features: Lovely Colorful Faith-based Stationery Supplies for Ladies: Well-made from handcrafted materials, this letter writing kit features a multicolor note pad made of smooth, sturdy cardstock and offers forty, easy tear-off pages measuring 0.2" x 6.3" x 8.5" and twenty coordinating envelopes measuring 6.5" x 4.5" allowing two pieces of paper to be used per envelope.

Gorgeous Bouquets of Flowers: The front and back covers of the notepad feature a lined, white colored background. The main cover displays a gold foiled rectangular frame with lemonade pink and white watercolor blossoms blooming in two corners. The floral design is complemented with an arrangement of leafy green vines.

Motivational Bible Verses for Loved Ones: An excerpt from Romans 1:7 is printed on the front cover in an elegant golden foil text and encompassed by the gold the rectangular border: “Grace and Peace to you.” Four additional Scripture references alternate on the bottoms of each separate piece of paper: 2 Corinthians 9:8, 2 Corinthians 13:14, Psalm 106:1, & Romans 15:13.

Multicolor Garden Design for Writers: Each snow white page is evenly lined and features a soft blend of washed pink and white flowers with a touch of yellow and green leaflets on the bottom left corner. The back of each page is left blank for any additional notes needed. The coordinating envelopes are a blush pink and the self-seal interiors match the notepad's main floral design.

Gifting Made Easy: Packaged in a coordinating soft cyan blue gift box, this set makes a wonderful gift idea for many occasions, especially for the card sender, letter writer, notetaker, & stationery enthusiast in your life. The durable box can be reused for organization to store cards, lists, letters, and more. Be a blessing to a friend, family member, or loved one and encourage them in their faith when presenting a gift of faith, hope, and love.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Grace and Peace White Floral Writing Paper and Envelope Set - Romans 1:7 Take some time to share your heart when you pen heartfelt words on the Grace and Peace White Floral Writing Paper and Envelope Set. The white cover of the writing pad features a shiplap design decorated with two floral bouquets set in opposite corners. The sentiment is presented in gold foiled letters placed within a gold foiled frame: Grace and peace - Romans 1:7 The writing pad features 40 sheets of lined paper. Each page is decorated with a floral bouquet set in the bottom left corner and features one of four Scripture verses. God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you'll abound in every good work. - 2 Corinthians 9:8 May the grace of the LORD Jesus Christ, and the love of God, and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit be with you. - 2 Corinthians 13:1 Give thanks to the LORD for he is good; His love endures forever. - Psalm 106:1 May the God of hope fill you with all you and peace as you trust in him, so that you may overflow with hope by the power of the Holy Spirit. - Romans 15:13 The pages tear off easily and fit nicely in the blush pink envelopes and a floral design adorns the interior of each of the 20 envelopes included in the set. The set is packaged in a coordinating teal gift box with a clear lid and is part of the Walk by Faith Collection that includes a faux leather bookmark, faux leather journal, wirebound journal, and ceramic mug. It makes a special gift for a birthday and can also be given as a thank-you gift to a Bible study leader or teacher. Floral bouquets against white shiplap backgroundLined paper pad with 40 tear-off pages & 20 blush pink envelopesFull-color design & full-color interior printed envelopesPaper and envelope set packaged in clear top boxPaper pad size: 8.5" x 6.3" x 0.2" (216 x 160 x 5 mm)Envelope size: 6.5" x 4.5" (165 x 114 mm)Set size: 9.5" x 6.9" x 1.2" (241 x 174 x 31mm)

Christian Gifts Designed in House Merging Scripture with contemporary design to create gifts for all occasions Christian Art Gifts' motto is faith, hope and love and our purpose is to celebrate what is good, true and beautiful through the products we create. Our unique line of gifts offer countless ways to affirm a friendship, encourage a loved one, congratulate a success, love a neighbor or remind someone of their faith.
